item.title: By: David Lantner
item.dc:creator: David Lantner
item.description:
Thanks again for giving your talk. I mentioned some Firefox add-ons that I use and you can view most of them here:
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/collection/front-end-web-development
In addition to those, here's the Firebug add-on that tracks changes:
http://www.incaseofstairs.com/firediff/
Thanks again!
item.content:encoded:
Thanks again for giving your talk. I mentioned some Firefox add-ons that I use and you can view most of them here:

https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/collection/front-end-web-development

In addition to those, here’s the Firebug add-on that tracks changes:

http://www.incaseofstairs.com/firediff/

Thanks again!
